title: Four Fish - author mentions Francis Galton

content.prompt: In the third paragraph, the author mentions Francis Galton primarily to

choices.label: cite supporting evidence for the author's argument about eugenics
provide a possible solution to a long-standing problem
acknowledge an influential thinker in the field of food science
describe a perspective that the author considers problematic

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
